mapper.insert: insert into user_identify ( user_id, type_id, id_no, status, litpic, verify_time, verify_user, verify_remark, add_time ) values( #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{typeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{litpic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{verifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{verifyUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{verifyRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
